text: Yeah i was planning on stop working and focus on my studies since year 13 is a important year. I feel like with my personal statement i struggle more with the structure of it and also im not sure what is appropriate to add into the personal statement. So mainly the structure of my personal statment i struggle most with, and also when people say talk about your hobbies and intrests i dont know what to write about since i dont have any :laughing:.
